name: Stone Break
description:
TRY BUT DON'T GIVE UP

Immerse yourself in the tense atmosphere of lost happiness. Yesterday you only wanted to ask for the hand and heart of your beloved, and today you have to go down into incredibly complex and intricate caves to find your family. How unlucky you are that the rift happened right under your house.

Everything is in your hands, act, even if it is not easy. Make tens of thousands of attempts to descend a little deeper and finally save your family.

Participate in the development together with the entire community. 

The game is still in development, but YOU can already TRY it!

PROJECT FEATURES

  • 1) Beautiful pixel graphics
  • 2) Simple, but no less complex gameplay
  • 3) Quick gaming sessions

Text on the next page

  • 67) Addictive gameplay
  • 68) Find and write down your favorite feature of the game

BET YOU WILL NOT GO TO THE END?
